name: gauche
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
awkward and uncomfortable with other people, especially because young and without experience: She had grown from a gauche teenager to a self-assured young woman.

Add to word list
Add to word list
behaving in a way that is offensive to other people, esp. because of not knowing what is correct or not caring about the feelings of others: It was gauche to invite them just two days before the party.
